entry.title: Bridge returned error 500! (18686)
entry.content:
blm5280 - Instagram Bridge was unable to receive or process the remote website's content!
Error message: `Unable to find username in search result.`
Query string: `action=display&bridge=Instagram&context=Username&u=blm5280&media_type=all&direct_links=on&format=Atom`
Version: `dev.2020-02-26`

  • Press Return to check your input parameters
  • Press F5 to retry
  • Check if this issue was already reported on GitHub (give it a thumbs-up)
  • Open a GitHub Issue if this error persists

pauder

entry.title: Let’s bring that up to 100% #DefundThePolice
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Let’s bring that up to 100%

#DefundThePolice

In just two months, 24 officers have left the Aurora Police Department, according to the department. In 2020, the department experienced a 61% increase in officers leaving the police force. A former officer is now shedding light on the morale inside the department.

thedenverchannel.com

Aurora police faced a 61% spike in officers leaving the force in 2020 compared to 2019

In just two months, 24 officers have left the Aurora Police Department, according to the department. In 2020, the department experienced a 61% increase in officers leaving the police force. A former officer is now shedding light on the morale inside the department.In just two months, 24 officers have left the Aurora Police Department, according to the department. In 2020, the department experienced a 61% increase in officers leaving the police force. A former officer is now shedding light on the morale inside the department.

We will never give up the fight for justice!

Your life mattered, and matters still....
All love and power to Sheneen McClain as she celebrates the life of her son, and his gentle spirit.

entry.title: Our BLM Philly sibling needs support making a safe landing space...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Our BLM Philly sibling needs support making a safe landing space for Philly organizers a reality.
Please donate and share!
#WeKeepUsSafe #Reparations #MutualAid

Denzel Caldwell

Please help my comrade

YahNé Ndgo is an organizer with BLM Philly and the Black Alliance for Peace. She is a fighter whose driving force is love, and this space... is one way she seeks to embody her belief that care must be a key part of our revolution. Please support this effort. Her cashapp, venmo and paypal details are included in the graphic. Send funds and share.

Paypal: paypal.me/yahnendgo

Cashapp: $yahnendgo

Venmo: @yahnedgo

entry.title: THIS WEEK! February 21 - 28 & All Year Long! Take a walk...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

THIS WEEK! February 21 - 28 & All Year Long!
Take a walk through the rich history of Denver as you stroll the Welton Corridor and celebrate the Black history of Five Points. Visit historic buildings, learn about the pioneers of our neighborhood, take in mural art, and celebrate all that Five Points stands for.
​
Grab your digital passport and enter to win prizes!

HAPPENING NOW

Five Points Black History Stroll

Welton Corridor - Five PointsCauses · 418 people

entry.title: #JusticeForElijahMcClain
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

#JusticeForElijahMcClain

Candice Bailey

157 pages of someone else saying that policy needs to be changed.
Aurora has wasted time and money on a private investigation that impacts absolutely NOTHING.
ELIJAH MCCLAIN WAS MURDERED.
PERFORMATIVE ACTION WILL NOT SERVE AS JUSTICE FOR MURDER.

entry.title: A spokesperson for a local Black Lives Matter group said the new...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

A spokesperson for a local Black Lives Matter group said the new report confirmed that McClain should never have been confronted by police in the first place.

"Results from the independent investigation in the murder of Elijah further supports what his family and community already knew," said Apryl Alexander, a community organizer and spokesperson for BLM 5280. "He was a young man trying to walk home and confronted without cause. Instead of simply talking to Elijah, physical force was used within 10 seconds—not enough time for him to even explain that he was going home. Criminalizing Black people for living their lives needs to end."

Millions of people had called for justice for McClain, who died after he was put in a chokehold by Aurora, Colorado, police.

buzzfeednews.com

Police Had No Reason To Stop Elijah McClain, An Independent Report Found

Millions of people had called for justice for McClain, who died after he was put in a chokehold by Aurora, Colorado, police.Millions of people had called for justice for McClain, who died after he was put in a chokehold by Aurora, Colorado, police.

entry.title: Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will continue to share links to bail/legal support fundraising in Denver, Minneapolis and beyond. We encourage friends to donate to BLM5280’s Emergency Fund using Venmo http://venmo.com/BLM5280 . These donations will be used for bail, legal support, and provision of direct services for Black people impacted by the current and ongoing crisis. If you would like to make a tax-deductible donation that we will have access to at a later date, you can visit our Colorado Gives Day Page to donate through our fiscal sponsor, Rocky Mountain Peace and Justice Center.

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism. To expose, address and eradicate structures and systems of oppression in Denver, BLM5280 uses a holistic racial j...
